meanings.definition: The mystical interpretation of the Old Testament in Jewish tradition.
meanings.sent1: Studying cabbalahs helps people understand the ancient Jewish texts better.
meanings.sent2: She delved into the cabbalahs to uncover hidden meanings in the scriptures.
meanings.sent3: The group claimed to have found cabbalahs that revealed the secret to eternal life.
meanings.sent4: Her fascination with cabbalahs turned her into a seeker of hidden truths.
meanings.sent5: The cabbalahs painted a vivid picture of the spiritual world for the students.

meanings.definition: Secret or hidden knowledge or teachings.
meanings.sent1: The old book contained cabbalahs that only a few could decipher.
meanings.sent2: He believed that cabbalahs held the key to unlocking universal mysteries.
meanings.sent3: The magician claimed his powers came from ancient cabbalahs passed down through generations.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the excitement of uncovering forbidden cabbalahs.
meanings.sent5: The cabbalahs whispered secrets of the universe to those who dared to listen.
